package.name: MailCampaigns
package.summary: De MailCampaigns Magento Connector zorgt voor een optimale integratie tussen MailCampaigns en uw Magento webshop.
package.description: De MailCampaigns Magento Connector synchroniseert gegevens uit je webshop met MailCampaigns om het zo makkelijk mogelijk te maken om e-mailings te versturen en contactgegevens up-to-date te houden. Laat MailCampaigns je contacten verrijken met nieuwe gegevens op basis van hun gedrag en klikhistorie.
package.notes:
Added in version 0.1.9: - support for multistore/view products - support for multiple images per product
Added in version 1.0.1: - separation of store configs; it is possible to connect different MailCampaigns accounts to one Magento environment but to multiple stores.
Added in version 1.0.2: - More efficient memory usage
Added in version 1.1.1 - Import order history with option
Added in version 1.1.2 - Import products with option - Import order product categories
Added in version 1.1.3 - You can set which items should be synchronized and imported.
Added in version 1.1.4 - You can set which items should be synchronized OR imported.
Added in version 1.1.5 - Bugfix history import
Added in version 1.1.6 - Added support for Magento issue: customers and mailing list entries with store_id = 0
Added in version 1.1.7 - Added support for Magento issue: order history with store_id = 0
Added in version 1.1.8 - Billing address information of customers
Added in version 1.1.9 - Splitted order products history
Added in version 1.2.0 - MailCampaigns API server separated from MailCampaigns Applications to be independent the availability of the main application.
Added in version 1.3.0 - Added MailCampaigns Queuing System to detach Magento directly from MailCampaigns. Running Magento cronjobs is required.
Added in version 1.3.1 - Added optional order tracking code on success page.
Added in version 1.3.2 - Bulk import has been changed to a more sophisticated model to generate less server load and timeouts. - Bugfix for table error message when sync products is disabled.
Added in version 1.3.3 - Memory reservation removed
Added in version 1.3.4 - Insert method updated and error timeout increased to 24 hours
Added in version 1.3.5 - Bug fix importing data into temp tables
Added in version 1.3.6 - Bug fix tables names when using prefixes - Tracking code included for page tracking - Configuration of module can be derived from website and default configuration.
Added in version 1.4.0 - Changed queue handling - User configurable parameters for bulk import data
Added in version 1.4.2 - Changed events for abandonded cart
Added in version 1.4.4 - Changed events for abandonded cart
Added in version 1.4.5 - Added support for extra Guest Order shipping address fields - Added support to gather Parent ID of child products
